column5: Finally got a chance to sit and post a couple pictures of my annual spring canoe in somewhere trip. We decided to do an easy one this year, only 5 short poratges into Algonquin and a couple 10+ klm paddles. We were in on a Friday and out on the Sunday. Beautiful weather, fish were bitting and they sure tasted great. We got a bunch (10?) of Brook trout around 15-17" and 1 lake trout that was a bit bigger. We feasted on Brook trout after the first full day of fishing. I've never kept 4 fish in a whole trip before, this day we kept 4 for one meal.It was fantastic! Awesome time as usual.
awesome, me and my buddy were up there the same days, and did quite well too.  thanks for sharing
Thanks for the report.Didn't get a chance to get up there yet this year but I will soon.
that full plate photo is just lip smacking good !
that'd make for a good trip, congrats. love that second pic.   looks like a perfect day .
Outstanding Trev, glad to see you guys did well.
